item.title: This Week I Learned
item.description: This Week I Learned (TWIL) is a weekly selection of interesting things and links I found useful during the week. Apps and Tools @media (max-width: 640px) { .embed-image { min-width: 100%; } } goulinkh/podcast-cli CLI podcast player. Contribute to goulinkh/podcast-cli development by creating an account on GitHub. https://github.com | Created with NoEmbed @media (max-width: 640px) { .embed-image { min-width: 100%; } } ‎Data Jar ‎Data Jar is a data store designed to be used with Shortcuts.
